com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite

Class SqliteTypeAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.SqliteTypeAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeAdapter<T>

    public abstract class SqliteTypeAdapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TypeAdapter<T>

    Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to columns in a SQLite database and vice versa.

    Version:
    1.0 03/17/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SqliteTypeAdapter(TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType dataType)
      Creates a new SqliteTypeAdapter pertaining to the given TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType.

      • SqliteTypeAdapter

        public SqliteTypeAdapter(TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType dataType)
        Creates a new SqliteTypeAdapter pertaining to the given TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType.
        Parameters:
        dataType - the SqliteDataType of the column this type maps to

    • Method Detail

      • mapToColumn

        public abstract void mapToColumn(T value,
               java.lang.String column,
               android.content.ContentValues values)
        Maps the given value to the given column.
        Parameters:
        value - the value being mapped
        column - the column being mapped to
        values - the ContentValues containing the data mappings for the entire row

      • mapObjectToColumn

        public abstract void mapObjectToColumn(java.lang.Object value,
                     java.lang.String column,
                     android.content.ContentValues values)
        Maps the given Object value to the given column.
        Parameters:
        value - the value being mapped
        column - the column being mapped to
        values - the ContentValues containing the data mappings for the entire row

      • setSqliteType

        public void setSqliteType(TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType sqliteType)
        Sets the TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType for this SqliteTypeAdapter. This value indicates the data type of the column being mapped to.
        Parameters:
        sqliteType - the SqliteDataType of column

      • getSqliteType

        public TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType getSqliteType()
        Returns the TypeResolutionPolicy.SqliteDataType for this SqliteTypeAdapter. This value indicates the data type of the column being mapped to.
        Returns:
        SqliteDataType of column
